is.iclt.icenlp.facade
Class IceNLP

java.lang.Object
  is.iclt.icenlp.facade.IceNLP

public class IceNLP
extends java.lang.Object

Provides singleton access to tools from the IceNLP toolbox, IceTagger and IceParser. Use the getInstance() method to acccess those tools.

Author:
Anton Karl Ingason

Method Detail

analyze

public java.lang.String analyze(java.lang.String input)

getInstance

public static IceNLP getInstance()
Provides a unique instance of the IceNLP class. The instance can be used to invoke methods for Part-of-Speech tagging and parsing Icelandic text.

Returns:
A unique instance of IceNLP.

parse

public java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String input)
Parses the input using IceParser. IceParser is a rule based shallow parser (chunker) and part of the IceNLP toolbox.

Parameters:
input - Part-of-Speech tagged text of the format returned by (@link #tag) method of this class. Encoding UTF-8.
Returns:
Parsed text. Includes tags as well as annotation of phrases. Encoding UTF-8. Returns null if input is null.

tag

public java.lang.String tag(java.lang.String input)
Part-of-Speech (PoS) tags a String using IceTagger. IceTagger is a rule based PoS tagger for Icelandic and part of the IceNLP toolbox.

Parameters:
input - The text to be tagged. The input format is one sentence per line and the encoding should be UTF-8.
Returns:
The tagged text. The output format is one sentence per line where each token is followed by its PoS-tag. Encoding is UTF-8. Returns null if input is null.

tagAndParse

public java.lang.String tagAndParse(java.lang.String input)
Tags and parses a String using IceTagger and IceParser. Equivalent to calling tag(java.lang.String) first and passing the output to parse(java.lang.String).

Parameters:
input - The text to be tagged and parsed. Encoding UTF-8.
Returns:
Tagged and parsed text, null if input is null.

tokenize

public java.lang.String tokenize(java.lang.String input)
